product_name: Vittoria Rubino Pro Slick Tire - 700 x 23
long_description: Vittoria Rubino Pro Slick high-performance racing/training tire features a slick twin tread design for durability and excellent cornering. Nylon 150 TPI casing is the market-standard for high performance tires. Kevlar Endura 3D Compound increases wear-resistance and ensures superior tread-life; low energy absorption and very good grip on all roads. Hard tread is placed in the center where the wear occurs, while shoulders are made of a softer compound for unparalleled cornering. Puncture-resistant belting is placed under the tread to ensure greater durability while maintaining lower rolling resistance. High-mileage tire is ideal for both training and racing.
short_description: Vittoria Rubino Pro Slick high-performance racing/training tire features a slick twin tread design for durability and excellent cornering.
